However, it is physically difficult for me to stay with him and provide him with guidance. I apologize to my juniors, but I would like to talk with them while riding Mount Imagine. Can I use it for a while?
Various legacies have been found in the "Valley of Machines" and among them are materials related to liquid memory. Your sister asked you to help retrieve them for research and posterity--oh. No, no, no, my senior!　Let's see, what was it? Anyway, she told me to borrow Mount Imagine and retrieve it!　I know it's a hassle, but just lend me some!
I did a lot of intensive monster-killing at the Boroum Ruins. My teammates were trying to make new weapons and needed materials. That was fine, but everyone was so enthusiastic about it that we ended up with a huge amount. Our own mounted imagines are not enough, so I was wondering if we could borrow some for transport.
Currently, we have a team of several adventurers at the Pioneer Station who are conducting an intensive survey of the "Castenore Ruins". It is going to take some time yet, so we would like to set up a supply system. Would it be possible to borrow Mount Imagine so that we can go back and forth between the camp and the site frequently? Thank you in advance.
A large number of weapons discarded by Bernhardt's army were found in the "Bernhardt Castle Underground Waterway. It would be a big problem if someone were to steal them. The order was to retrieve them immediately, but there were more than expected, and the subordinates were upset. He asked to be allowed to use at least a mounted Imagine, so we had no choice but to let him. I am sorry, but I would like to borrow it temporarily.
I am a courier in Asterleeds. Recently, a monk came to me and asked to be my apprentice. He's never ridden a mount before. He's motivated and I'm not going to leave him alone. ...... Can you lend me a Mount Imagine to practice with?　I'll keep an eye on him and make sure he doesn't do anything crazy.
I'm editing a magazine, and the writer in charge wants to go to "Giant Tower Ruins" to develop his image. I am a former adventurer, so I am fine, but it would be a disaster if he got hurt. I would like to borrow Mount Imagine so that I can escape immediately in case of emergency.
I'm supposed to be working on a request with a fellow adventurer. There are two of us, and we're going to try to get all the different requests done at once. However, this guy is a bit of a stickler for time, and he can't stand even the slightest deviation from the schedule. It's not good for his mental health to go around on foot. I'd like to get a mount for him, but I don't know if I can ask him.
I would like to request the loan of a Mount Imagine for the investigation of the Drava Royal Research Institute. Normally, I could do this kind of mission on foot, but I need my feet because my superiors want me to report every step of the way. I would think that a soldier should run, but my superiors are very picky about that. I have no choice but to ask to use Mount Imagine.
I received a request for a song to accompany the climax of a play, a scene in which adventurers ride Mount Imagine through the Valley of the Coral Rocks, which is a very difficult order. ...... I am going to ask someone I know to actually ride the mount to get the inspiration. Can I borrow it for a little while?
It appears that an unexplored mine shaft has been discovered at the "Tower Rock Mine Ruins." Adventurers broke up a large rock blocking the entrance, but it turned into a considerable amount of debris. There was no telling how long it would take to haul it out by hand. We would like to deploy a number of mounted imagines for efficient transport. Would it be possible to borrow them?
We are devising a route for training new recruits to board Mount Imagine. We need to confirm in advance whether this training will actually work. However, unfortunately, the Knights' mounts have been sent on a mission. Is there anyone who has Mount Imagine and would be willing to help the Knights?
The bridges in Montegnor Valley are deteriorating here and there. The Pioneer Bureau is working with the local residents to repair them. Thank you, thank you. And we're going to need some mounts to transport the materials. If you could lend me some, that would be great. They are not going to close the bridge to traffic, so you can go through as usual.
Oh my god!　A girl I've been corresponding with for a long time is coming over to my house, but I thought I'd never see her anyway, so I wrote a lie saying that I had a cool Mount Imagine at home and that I'd give her a ride sometime!　Can I borrow your Mount Imagine just for now?　Adventurer, you must have a cool one!
I want to clean up the "Alston Abandoned Mine". The mine is closed and no one is allowed to enter, but if something were to happen, it would be dangerous. We don't want strange people getting in. I'll send someone to clean it up. Can I borrow Mount Imagine as a foot soldier?　I want to make sure that only people I trust are involved there. Please.
In a dream, a family asked me to help them. They said they were looking for their father who was killed in the Castenore Ruins. I know it's just a dream, but they asked me to help them, so I can't help it. I'm going to find some relics and offer them to him. I'm going to search through the ruins, so I'm going to need my feet. Can I borrow Mount Imagine?
Thieves are hanging out in the vicinity of the Soundless City. Although they do not seem to go inside, it is a serious matter concerning the dignity of Bapharia as a holy place. After deliberation, it has been decided that we will visit the place in person to explain the importance of the place and urge them to change their minds. Let's do the right thing. We would like to borrow Mount Imagine for the move.
I found a client with a lot of feathers, and he wants me to escort him to see "The Throne of Mayuki". Well, if you go and come back soon, we can work something out. ...... However, it's hard indeed without the speed of Mount Imagine. I'm embarrassed to say I don't have any on hand. Can you lend me some while I'm on the job?
Monster attacks have occurred along the transportation route of the "Red Ore Quarry. It is an important place for the people of Salamzart to obtain building materials and supplies. I and a team of familiar adventurers have decided to reinforce our patrols, but we don't have enough mounted imagines. Sorry, can we borrow them?
I'm planning a maze competition in the Kartoum Sandstone Corridor with some of my junior adventurers. It will also serve as training for exploration. Of course, I will remove any danger in advance, but I want to prepare mounted imagines so that we can escape immediately in case of emergency. My mounted imagines are not enough. Can you lend me one?
I heard that there is a team that is going to investigate the "Sienne Ruins".　The people who belong to this team all have no sense of direction. If we wait for them to arrive, they will become old ladies. Then Mea-chan will give them a special ride to the site. She's busy, too, so can't you let us use Mount Imagine?
My son is a soldier in Bernhardt's army, and he is going on a mission soon to take down a dragon tribe. Even though it is his duty, I am worried about him. I am going to pray for his safety at least until he comes back to his hometown, "Kahuna's Cave. I wonder if you could lend me your Mount Imagine to help me get back and forth.
The trees of the "Silent Forest" in "Koaniani Forest" are protected by the people of the forest. However, it seems that the number of diseased and damaged trees is increasing, perhaps due to the lack of help from the previous generation. I would like to go around and examine the trees, but the tools for this purpose are too heavy for me to carry alone. I would like to borrow a Mount Imagine for transport.
In the Zero Zone of the Tree of Life in Koaniani Forest, there are trees that grow leaves that can be used to make medicines. However, we cannot pluck them from the trees. We have to collect the leaves that fall naturally. The leaves in the forest are so plentiful that it is difficult to distinguish them from each other. We have to just load them up and take them home, so I wonder if we could borrow a Mount Imagine for transport.
The "Hidden Mine of Tomdrum," where bandits and ruffians come, seems to be used for shady dealings. So the adventurers from the Pioneering Bureau take turns keeping watch. But the long hours of watch are making us hungry!　With only a limited number of people to take turns, we decided to stock up on food during our break. Can you lend me your mount-imagine to carry it all at once?
I have a client who wants to use the sand from "Götterdämmerung in the Sea of Sand" for his garden. He says he needs it to express his thoughts. He wants to spread the sand in the garden and draw water patterns. Why not just make a pool with regular water?　I'm going to pick up the sand several times for prototyping, so I need to borrow Mount Imagine for transportation.
You have a nice Mount Imagine, don't you?　Actually, I'm testing an existing Mount Imagine on the "Misty Sea of Trees" course to use as a reference for a new Mount Imagine. That feeling of being in the wind with Imagine ...... hahahaha, I can't get enough of it!　I would love to have your help!　Don't worry, I won't make you feel bad!
My son insisted on crossing the ocean. Well, I was born and raised in Jubilia. A man has to go to sea someday. As a parent, I would just provide him with a good-luck charm. I want to go to the Cave of Kahuna to collect materials that are bathed in the prayers of the land. It's a bit far, and I need to borrow Mount Imagine to get around.
It doesn't make much sense, but the "Zelma Mine Site" is documented to be owned by our family. The mine there is already closed, but if the diary of our ancestor found the other day is correct, we may still find an untouched deposit of ore. Please lend us your Mount Imagine to haul away the debris that has accumulated in the mine for our investigation.
The "Flower Touring Tree Cluster" is a place where grass and flowers grow thickly, and I regularly pull the weeds. So I thought I'd do it for the first time in a while, and I found that the grass had grown more than I had imagined. ...... I've only left it alone for a couple of years, though, right?　The plucked grass is too much for me to carry on my own, so please lend me a mounted Imagine to carry it on.
The "Tuonela Trail" is a treasure trove of flowers and grasses, and is full of flowers with wonderful fragrances!　My mother and I make perfumes from them, and they are very popular among the foresters. However, we had to keep up with carrying the flowers for the materials because of the overlap of orders. ...... Please lend me the flowers for a little while so I can transport them all at once at Mount Imagine!
The Arsenal of the Exiled is a factory of an ancient civilization, and may be related to an ancient city called the Ruins of Augurus. I have visited both places several times for my research, but walking on my own is tiring and dangerous!　I need to borrow Mount Imagine to get back and forth between the two cities!　It's for my research!　Best regards!
I intend to hold a ceremony to honor my ancestors at the "Graveyard of Spirits," but the tools I need are too many and bulky. Only a limited number of people are allowed to enter that place, but we are allowed to have a mounted imaginine loaded with tools waiting at the entrance. That alone will make the preparation easier, so could you lend me your mount-imagine?

Mount Imagine has long been valued as a traveler's foot. Its feather-like fur is pleasant to the touch, but its tail has a hard bone, and there is no end to the number of people who inadvertently approach it from behind and receive an unexpected blow. Its shimmering fur is very distinctive.
Foxy Mount Imagine. With light footsteps, I gallop across the meadow. It feels good to feel as if you are the wind. Its fluffy fur and tail are also popular.
Foxy Mount Imagine. With light steps, I gallop across the meadow. It feels good to feel as if you are the wind. Their sparkling fur and tail are also popular.
Mounted imagines of large horses, including Shagiran. With their stout physiques, they are able to carry heavily equipped adventurers on their backs without a tremor. They are extremely comfortable and stable, and boast outstanding reliability.
Sphere-based mounted imaginaries. It floats with a mysterious force and moves surprisingly smoothly. It is easy to balance and fun to ride.
Mount Imagine in Uribo. Despite his small appearance, he supports his rider well. Despite his short legs, he is also fast. He is a popular person with dull eyes.
In keeping with the venerable lore of "straddling and flying," the stylish broomstick-shaped Mount Imagine has been given a modern twist. It is balanced on its feet and comfortable to ride thanks to its saddle.
Mount Imagine is modeled after the appearance of weapons that have been in operation since ancient times. Its sharp silhouette makes it overwhelmingly popular among both children and adults. The figure running through the wilderness is majestic and reliable.
Mount Imagine is based on Bapharia's heritage of gliding through low altitudes. Young people are inventing various tricks to ride it in splendor. The unique sense of speed is full of charm that cannot be found anywhere else.
Mount Imagine is a historic mount Imagine that has been passed down in distant lands as folklore. It is said that seeing it run or touching its face will bring good health for the next year.
Mount Imagine, a dog with a slightly larger build. Some people enjoy petting its soft fur. Loyal and dependable, this is one type of dog that is undeniably popular. Many have said, "I want to teach him tricks!" Many people say, "I want to train him to do tricks!
The glittering stage-shaped Mount Imagine. You will be the center of attention and feel as if you are the center of the world. Change into a flashy costume and capture everyone's attention.
Mount Imagine, an animal that lives in the snowy regions of the northern continent. It is said that after several generations of selection and cultivation for riding, they form a deep bond with humans and leave behind an Imagine Seed. They are good partners for adventurers, not only on snowy roads.
Mount Imagine is popular among young people. Its flowing design cuts through the wind and allows it to traverse any road in any direction. It is also attracting attention from the elderly for its surprisingly stable ride and easy mobility.
Mount Imagine is a white horse that combines dignity and austerity. The majestic figure of Mount Imagine elevates the rider to a noble existence. The view from astride his back will be exceptional.
Mount Imagine takes the form of a majestic wolf. The figure's quick, flash-like charge through the earth is likened to a lightning bolt, and its refined silhouette is undeniably popular.
The tasteful Mount Imagine is described as "swimming in the earth. The flowing ride makes you feel as if you are in the water. It is also popular for its seasonal and emotional appearance.

King Manor figurine. Its dynamic pose is so impressive that it seems as if it is about to start moving at any moment. It is highly regarded as a sculpture that captures the best moment.

basic pass
advanced path
royal pass
The Basic Pass is a free plan that is automatically subscribed to when the Season Pass is held.
Advanced Pass is available by subscribing to a paid plan.
You can earn increased rank rewards and benefits that are advantageous to your strategy.
The rewards for paid plans for ranks reached before then will also be
All can be acquired.
The Loyal Pass immediately increases a certain number of ranks in addition to the benefits of the Advanced Pass.
You will also earn all paid plan rewards for the ranks you have reached up to that point.
You will earn increased rank rewards and benefits that are advantageous to your strategy. You can also earn all paid plan rewards for ranks you have reached up to that point.
Accept the following benefits during the season of purchase
Increased rank rewards for paid passes only
Unlimited use of Royal Esthetic Course
Reward plus recovery + 1 time/day
The Basic Pass cannot be used to access the Seasonal Quests of the paid plan.
Only one of the Advanced Pass and Royal Pass can be purchased at a time. They cannot be purchased at the same time.

G1: 4-stage attack that ejects arrows. Can move during the attack.

G1: Generates an area that heals a small amount of allied HP. When damage is inflicted, the BC gauge increases. When the gauge exceeds a certain level, the level increases and the Recovery amount increases. Gauge resets when fired.
G2: Increased BC gauge increase when damage is inflicted
G3: Increased HP Recovery amount
G4: Increased BC gauge increase when damage is inflicted by Week Attack
G5: When the BC Gauge level is at maximum, the recovery area expands and becomes a double range. The inner area further recovers HP and grants "auto heal". Auto heal automatically activates a certain amount of recovery effect when the granted player's HP falls below a certain percentage or a certain amount of time elapses. The effect ends when the recovery effect is activated.

G1: When a player successfully rescues another player, the player is revived with increased movement speed of the other player.
G1: When the imprint is consumed, it grants itself "the effect of absorbing HP when attacking". The duration of the effect is extended according to the number of imprints consumed. Requires an interval until the ability is reactivated.
G2: Extended effect time to absorb HP when attacking
G3: Further extends the duration of the effect of absorbing HP when attacking.
G4: Max HP absorbing effects are reduced in the interval before they can be re-applied.
G1: A 4-stage combo of 3-stage melee attack and remote attack using a guitar. The fourth stage of the remote attack is a ranged attack when the amp is hit. When attacking while moving left and right, the second stage is derived from a ranged attack centered on the attacker and the amp. If the normal attack button is pressed and released, a ranged attack centered on the amp and himself will be derived, and when the heat gauge is at its maximum, a ranged attack will be performed while activating the High Spirit state. When in High Spirit state, the range of the 4-round combo attack is expanded and Damage Dealt is increased. The range of left-right derived attacks and ranged attacks is expanded, and the frightening effect is enhanced.
G2: Derived into a Light Element remote attack with a forward movement input, and a Light Element ranged attack is generated when the amp spreads hit. Light Elemental Charge accumulation value of this attack is greatly increased when in High Spirit state.
G3: Derived from a remote attack that grants a buff that increases one's heat gauge for a certain amount of time with a post-movement input, and a ranged attack occurs when the amp spreads hit. When in High Spirit state, this buff changes to a Stamina consumption reduction buff for evasion.
G4: Light Element Resistance Down - Small on enemies hit by Light remote attacks.
G1: Places an amplifier that generates range attacks and range buffs in conjunction with its own attacks and buffs. Long press to place the amp at the targeted location.
G2: Extension of possible amplifier installation distance
G3: Extended amp duration
G4: Extended duration of high spirit state
G5: A count is generated each time a T-skill is activated, and a buff area is deployed at his and Amp's positions each time the count reaches three. The effect of the buff area changes depending on the T-skill activated at the third count or the type of derivation of the normal attack. If it is a buff T-skill or a front-derived attack, the effect is "Damage Received - Medium"; if it is a debuff T-skill or an attack T-skill or a left- or right-derived attack, the effect is "Damage Received - Small".
If it is a recovery T-skill or a post-derivative attack, "Recovery amount increase, medium" will be deployed.
Performs and plays a magnificent song. With the song, it generates a ranged attack centered on itself, an area that heals allies' HP, and a buff area that grants medium Damage Dealt and small Damage Received to allies in turn. If there is an amplifier installed by the performer in the field, an area with the same effect will be generated around that amplifier at the same time.

The two will liberate Avaritia and save the planet from the coming doom.
We were to cooperate with it.

The 'visitors' are said to be Gentiles with special powers. It is said that some consider them to be the ones who cause disasters.

Although they managed to fight off the avaritia, the identity of the girls is unknown. They are also strongly wary of us.
And then - and then.
The walls of the room shattered and a new intruder appeared.
Voldigen, king of the largest and most powerful dragon tribe.
Its overwhelming power fed on avaritia and kicked out even the most elite gatekeepers.
Voldigen has his sights set on us and is slowly approaching.
There is no escape, there is no choice but to fight.
At that thought, the girls created a sphere of light. As they called out to me, I jumped into the light.
As I was enveloped in a floating sensation and the light disappeared - Voldigen's figure suddenly vanished, and the avalitia that should have defeated him was sealed in the ceiling.
It was as if nothing had happened.
I asked the two girls what happened.
Their names are Aerinse and Tyris. They escaped from Voldigen by jumping through time through "Chronoleap".
It's hard to believe, but as I was leaving "Pillar of Divinity", I passed "myself and Feste" coming in. ......

Aerinse seems to be suffering from the effects of chronolepsy.

It is an entity that arises from a distortion of time and space, killing its past self. That is avaritia.
Only Aerinse can correct the distortion and restore the twisted cause and effect.
But the ritual is also an act that wears Aerinse down significantly.
We decided to return to Litze once more to let Aerinse rest.

The goal is to liberate avaritia.

In a time when distortions were still minimal, they could be dealt with. For this reason, the two came to the present day by chronoleap.

It is the "Avaritia Shell Project".
The idea was to fuse Aerinse with a special "avaritia shell" to control other avaritia.
Of course, there were many dissenting opinions, and it was finally settled that Aerinse would liberate Avaritia.
However, even this was Bachelard's intention. As a result of releasing the avaritia and activating the biological engram, Aerinse was more easily fused with the avaritia shell.
The fusion of Aerinse and Avaritia Shell is still underway.

Hi, my name is Surho. I work in a rose garden.
Actually, I received a mysterious plant from a client. It was supposed to be a magnificent flower, but no matter how long I waited, it never bloomed.
I've tried a lot of things too. ......
I want to make it bloom somehow, so can you help me?
My name is Monica.
The other day I saw something that really caught my attention. I saw my childhood friend, Sulho-kun, giving a bouquet of roses to his gay sister!
What kind of relationship do you two have?
I'm curious but don't have the courage to ask myself: .......
Please go check on that sister!　Please!
I am Isaac, a miner.
I'm training under my master, Mr. Baumann. I lost something very important in the cave. ......
I have to report this to my master, but I'm so scared that my legs are shaking. Please tell the master what's going on for me!
Oh, it's Baumann who runs the mine.
I've been making memorandums about the veins around here for a long time. Before I knew it, a vein I didn't know existed had been written down.
I can't believe that there is a vein of ore that I don't even know exists in the Great Litze Cave.
I'm not sure, but I don't have enough hands to be sure.
Can you go check to see if the vein is real?
You have a nice face!　I can feel your star power.
I'm Barni. I am the world's first adventurer producer.
What do you think?　Would you like to develop your talent as an adventurer with my production?
You will be a top star, you will have status, honor, money, everything.
Come on, take your first step toward glory with me!

We have a young miner named Akka. Lately, he hasn't been getting any work done at all.
I know you and your girlfriend are going through a difficult time in your personal life.
See, isn't it troublesome for the boss to meddle in these things?　To be honest, I'm interested. But you know what?
I don't want things to get complicated, so I'd like you to explore instead. Please.
Oh, I'm Dr. Volker.
I hear there are some strange drugs floating around these days, do you know about them?
Avaritia Prophylaxis, ......, with a very disturbing name.
I've been asked by the Bapharia Order to help out. I can't do it on my own.
I need to check it out thoroughly. Can you help me?
I am Uro, a woodworker. I make wooden souvenirs.
We get very good lumber around here.
But this is not something you can just cut in the woods. It's an ancient relic.
That's why it's so hard for someone like me, who doesn't know how to fight, to get it.
They are about to run out, and I need you to find them for me.
I'm Garb. I'm a street vendor.
I'm planning to start a business in Salamzart, and there's a guy who might be a nuisance.
No, no, no, it's not a business rivalry. In fact, travelers are being attacked on the road between Salamzart and Litze.
If we leave them alone, we will lose business.
The others are annoyed, too, and can you do something about it?

I came here with a request. ...... Actually, you know what?
I got lost on .......
Please take me to a place called "Dragon Claw Valley.
Please!

I will fight again to surpass you!　Because I am the strongest and lone hero!

I am looking for a flower called "Kouka" that blooms around here. It is an extremely rare desert flower that is only told about in legends.

I need you to deliver the medicine to Tsurka.

Hello. I am Poirier, an apprentice at the Imagine Institute.
It's a joint project between the Pioneer Bureau and the Imagine Institute to give adventurers a chance to try their hand at crafting Enhance Imagine.
Enhance Imagine is a must for adventure, and I want you to have a basic knowledge of the craft.
This Poirier will be in charge, so take care of it!

Aegis Fighter's sword and shield, which means "harmony," were made in reference to the weapons used in Shinto rituals. It is made so that the wavelengths of the engrams flowing through both sides overlap, and when the two are combined, they exert a unique power.
Twin Striker's twin axes are based on weapons found in a closed room of the "Pillar of Divinity. The high heat produced by the engrams resides in the blades, which sink under their own weight just by biting into the rock.
Blast Archer's bow, which is said to have once lit the giant candelabra installed at the "Pillar of Divinity. It is said that those who are shot through the bow are burned by the sacred fire and suffer as much as the weight of their sins.
The Spell Caster's staff is said to have been depicted on a relief from the Bapharia civilization. To hold this staff in one's hand is to approach the wisdom of the ancients and to reach a higher level as a Spell Caster.
The Heavy Smasher's hammer was inspired by the furnaces used by the founders of blacksmithing in mythological times. With a burning flame at its tip, it shatters the enemy's will to fight with a blow like a blazing meteor.
The two-handed spear of the Blitz Lancer, which is said in the scriptures of the Bapharia faith to have been possessed by a mystical fire brought from the gods. The afterimage drawn by the tip of the spear releases a flame that will not be extinguished until it burns out evil.
The guitar is a beat performer on a mission to convey the authority of God by playing the music of battles in Bapharia mythology. When the strings are strummed, a purifying flame erupts to avenge the evil that torments people.

The sword and shield of a nameless Aegis Fighter who faced the dragon tribe in mortal combat without fear. Even if the glory of his victory is not spoken of in glowing terms, the achievements he left behind in the shadows of history are immeasurable and will never fade away.
The twin axes of an unnamed Twin Striker, whose fangs snapped the pride of the dragon tribe with a single blow. The figure of a man who silently fought through the battle without flaunting his accomplishments is conveyed to the present day with an increased weight.
Blast Archer's bow shot down every dragon tribe that covered the sky. The inevitable blow drew a beautiful arc and brought a ray of hope to a hopeless battle. He is supposed to be a rare master, but the details remain unknown.
The staff of a secret Spell Caster who is said to have buried the dragon tribe in the light. It is said to have wielded a tremendous amount of engrams and wrought destruction on an impossible scale. It is said to have disappeared with the dawn of time.
Heavy Smasher's Hammer, which repelled the dragon tribe's night attack head-on. He himself became a light in the darkness and gave courage to his comrades. After the deadly battle, this was the only weapon left on the battlefield.
The two-handed spear of Blitz Lancer, which pierced the solid body of the dragon tribe with unparalleled accuracy. It is a symbol of light that has remained at the forefront of the battlefield through many battles without the slightest distortion in response to the outstanding skills of its wielder.
The guitar of a beat performer who raised the spirits of his comrades on their way to the death and frightened even the dragon tribe with his energy. Although the legend remains, the music he played has been lost and nothing is known about him.
Aegis Fighter weapons made from unknown metals and ores found in the "Makabayuki Oza". The brilliance of the flames it contains is outstandingly strong.
A weapon for Twin Striker made from unknown metals and ores found in the "Mayuki Throne. The radiance of the flames it contains is outstandingly strong.
A weapon for Blast Archers made from unknown metals and ores found in the Mayuki Throne. The brightness of the flames it contains is outstandingly strong.
A weapon for Spell Caster made from unknown metals and ores found in the Mayuki Throne. The radiance of the flames it contains is outstandingly strong.

Weapons for beat performers made from unknown metals and ores found in the "Makabayuki Oza". The brightness of the flames it contains is outstandingly strong.
This is a reproduction of a sword and shield used by the elite guardians of the ancient city of Andra. It is said that the guardians operating the earthen engrams brought peace to the people of the city.
This is a reproduction of the twin axes that were carried by the death squads that went to their deaths in the ancient city of Andra. The firm will of those who volunteered to protect their country and families is said to give the weapons their power.
This is a reproduction of a bow held by the nobility of the ancient city of Andra. It is said that the nobles were obliged to protect the people of the city, excelled in martial arts, and willingly chose to take up arms.
This is a reproduction of a staff held by a military strategist who was a favorite of the king of the ancient city of Andra. The strategist, who sometimes taunted the king, had many enemies, but he is said to have turned back attackers with the power of this staff.
This is a reproduction of the hammer that is said to have terrorized nations hostile to the ancient city of Andra. It is said to have gathered the power of the earth into a single point and destroyed even the most solid city gates without difficulty.
It is a reproduction of the two-handed spear that pierced through numerous enemies of the ancient city of Andra. It has the same appearance as the famous spears that were passed down from generation to generation by heroes who fought without hesitation to protect their people.
It is a reproduction of the guitar given to the military band of the ancient city of Andra. Its performance never stopped in the face of any difficulty, and it was said to have inspired its comrades until the last moment.
A weapon for the Aegis Fighter, created by refining and painstakingly forging the ore mined in the "Red Ore Quarry. The cooled mechanism calls forth an engram of ice, creating a cold atmosphere.
A weapon for Twin Striker, created by refining and painstakingly forging the ore mined in the "Red Ore Quarry. The cooled mechanism calls forth an engram of ice, creating a cold atmosphere.
A weapon for Blast Archers, created by refining and carefully forging the ore mined in the "Red Ore Quarry. The cooled mechanism calls forth an engram of ice and a cold air.
A weapon for Spell Caster created by refining the ore mined in the "Red Ore Quarry" and painstakingly forging it. The cooled mechanism calls forth an engram of ice, creating an air of coldness.

A sword shield for Aegis Fighter, which is filled with a thunderous and violent force. It is said that lightning strikes, which have been accumulated over a period of time that far exceeds a human lifetime, are concentrated at that moment and released all at once.
A twin axe for Twin Striker with the engrams of lightning concentrated in its central part. The majestic blades are imbued with solidity and the power of a gushing bolt of lightning, breaking through all barriers. The roar is said to echo to the ends of the earth.
A bow for Blast Archers, which surely kills the enemy with a single shot, just like a purple lightning. Before the blow that rushes through with a flash of light, no matter how much history has been accumulated, it will come to naught.
A staff for Spell Caster that is said to turn vast deserts into scorched earth. The engrams of lightning incorporated into the staff descend in a thunderbolt that covers the sky. It is said to be the most destructive strike of lightning ever made.
This is a hammer for Heavy Smasher, which creates a thunderous roar and crushes everything in its path. It is feared that a single blow from this weapon will bring about the collapse of the world with the passage of time.
A two-handed spear for Blitz Lancer that unleashes a blinding thunderbolt force. It is said to penetrate walls, no matter how solid, with such ease that you cannot even feel it. While possessing immense power, it is easy to handle and extremely reliable.
This guitar for beat performers faithfully reproduces the intensity and gravity of lightning. The strings, which harbor the engrams of lightning, quiver sharply, tightening the atmosphere of the place and producing a weighty sound.
A weapon for Aegis Fighter, made from materials left in the "Ruins of Sienna," that evokes the rise and fall of the ancient city. It produces dark shadows as if to indicate the quietness of a vanished city.

The sword and shield of the Aegis Fighter, Accepted by the blessing of a shimmering flame. It is a sword that dispels darkness and illuminates people's paths. The red blade of the sword is befitting of one who should be a beacon of hope.
The Twin Striker's twin axes, clad in swirling flames, stir the fighting spirit of those who hold them in their hands. No matter what difficulties stand in their way, the blades will never dull. It is a symbol of courage to pave the road ahead.
Blast Archer's bow ignites upon hitting the target. The crimson flames burn away one's doubts and light a new light. The fire that was created by this bow in a former battle is said to be still protected as an object of faith.
A Spell Caster's staff that creates flames in the void and burns away evil. It concentrates engrams in an empty space and sets it ablaze at once. It is revered as a holy staff that has repelled threats to people many times.
Heavy Smasher's hammer that calls forth torrential flames that radiate intense heat. It helps those who seek salvation and mercilessly shatters the walls that block their way. A merciful weapon that crushes suffering with the power of destruction.
Blitz Lancer's two-handed spear is as powerful as burning Lava. The fierce heat at the tip of the spear pulsates from within and never cools, melting and piercing even the strongest armor.
The beat performer's guitar seals in the burning passion. The red flame rages with the roaring sound. The whole surrounding area is filled with heat and people are encouraged to move forward.
Aegis Fighter's sword and shield are made of materials from the "Zelma Mine Ruins" and are designed to be massive and reliable as a weapon. The power of the earth that still lies in the mine is engraved on it.
The twin axes for Twin Striker are made of materials from the "Zelma Mine Ruins" and are designed to be massive and reliable as a weapon. The power of the earth that still lies in the mine is engraved on the twin axes.

Based on materials from the "Zelma Mine Ruins," this guitar for beat performers is designed to be a weapon of great weight and reliability. The power of the earth that still lies in the mine is engraved on it.
This sword shield for Aegis Fighter is made of materials found in the "Flower Touring Tree Cluster," and is as supple and indomitable as a flower or grass. It is said to reproduce the roaring thunder that never ceases.
The twin axes for Twin Striker, made of materials found in the "Flower Touring Tree Cluster," are as supple and indomitable as flowers and grasses. It is said to have reproduced the roaring thunder that never ceases.
This bow for Blast Archers is made of materials found in the "Flower Circle Tree Cluster," and is as flexible as a flower and possesses an indomitable soul. It is said to have reproduced the roaring thunder that never ceases.
This is a staff for Spell Caster, made of materials found in the "Flower Circle Tree Cluster," and is as supple and indomitable as a flower. It is said to have reproduced the roaring thunder that never ceases.
The material used in the "Flower Touring Tree Cluster" is a hammer for the Heavy Smasher that is supple like a flower and has an indomitable soul. It is said to have reproduced the roaring thunder that never ceases.

Made of materials found in the "Flower Touring Tree Cluster," this guitar for beat performers is as supple and indomitable as a flower or grass. It is said to have reproduced the roaring thunder that never ceases.
The sword and shield have been exposed to the clear and freezing air. The blade, which is inhabited by the cold wind, cuts through everything, and the shield, which withstands the cold air, protects all things. The strength of ice is with these weapons.
A twin axe that hides an icy coldness inside its blade. It is said that those who are cut feel the heat of the wound, and the next moment they feel a chill that chills them to the point of freezing. By then it is already too late and the game is decided.
Mysterious and beautiful, this bow holds the power of ice. It is engraved with the same design as the talisman carried by worshippers who visit the "Tuonela approach". Accepting the blessing of the ancestral spirits of the forest, it protects people by freezing their grief and sorrow.
The cane is so cold that it is difficult to approach. It is said that the cane was forged during the coldest hours of the day, from midnight to early morning in the middle of winter. The surrounding air is frozen and shines so brightly that the cane appears to be covered in light.
With its overwhelming ice power, this hammer is said to shatter even volcanoes. Even the handle of the hammer feels a cutting coldness, reminding us of the same tension we feel on the battlefield. It is always ready for battle, and is truly a being for fighting.
A spear that conceals such icy power that powdery snowflakes dance around the blade. The tip of the spear gleams, combining beauty that enchants the beholder with a coldness that chills the spine. There is nothing that can catch its merciless flash.
The guitar plays a tone similar to the cold, clear air of a winter morning. Beautiful and sometimes solemn, it resonates with a transformative quality that gives one an indescribable shiver and repels one's enemies.
In Ulrau Village, there were once warriors who protected the deep forest where the ancestral spirits slept. These swords and shields represent the weapons they passed down from generation to generation along with their mission, and are said to carry the fire of their noble aspirations to the present day.
It is modeled after a scarred axe offered to an old stone monument in the Koaniani Forest. It is believed to have been in the hands of a brave warrior, and just by holding it, the fighting spirit stirred up in the user's hand becomes a flame that gushes out from the blade.
This bow was made in the image of a single flower that blooms when a strong and noble forest warrior dies. As if in answer to the prayer contained in the flower, it shoots out and burns down the evil that ravages the forest without a trace.
This staff is said to have been given to an ancient fire that has been smoldering for thousands of years deep beneath the forest. It contains an inexhaustible engram of fire, which increases the concentration of the Spell Caster to the utmost limit. The fire is feared to be an abomination that will burn the forest to the ground.
A hammer that has been painstakingly forged, never ceasing the seed fire blessed by the ancestral spirits. It carries in its body the beauty of flickering flames and never-ending heat. It is said that it releases its strongest flame when it fights to protect something precious.
This two-handed spear was given to the company from the engrams of fire stored in the rich forests of the region. It is both strong and flexible, and will not break under any impact.
This guitar plays a requiem for the ancestral spirits who have left us for the future. From its heated strings, it brings a warm tone that leads to a peaceful sleep. It is often called the weapon that best demonstrates the strength and tenderness of the ancestral spirits.

Issuance of Connect Coupon
Reward for number of times Connect Coupon is used
Connect Coupon" is a discount coupon that can be issued and passed on to other players.
terms of issue
Adventurer Rank: {KeyString} or higher
Other conditions
Clear {QuestType} at least {KeyString} times.
Expiration date remaining: {Timespan}
You will earn rewards based on the number of times your coupons are used by other players. <lf>Rewards will be automatically sent to your in-game inbox by letter!
*Rewards can be earned for each coupon issued. <lf>*At the end of the expiration date, the coupons issued will become invalid and the count of the number of times they have been used will also end.
<lf>Send the issued Connect Coupons to other players via social networking sites. <lf>Players who receive a Connect Coupon can purchase products at a discounted price only once per Connect Coupon. <lf>When other players use the Connect Coupon, you will be rewarded according to the number of people who used the coupon. <lf>
*Connect coupons issued by yourself cannot be used by yourself. <lf>*Please refrain from pasting in talk mode as it may cause unexpected problems.

Contribution Details
Damage Contribution
Contribution based on total damage inflicted on the enemy
Enemy Disturbance Contribution
Contribution based on damage inflicted on assault enemies, enemy gates, and enemy deadly devices
relief contribution
Contribution based on the number of times an ally is rescued
Contribution to hostility acquisition
Contribution based on the time spent being seen as hostile by non-boss enemies.
Boss Hostile View Acquisition Contribution
Contribution based on the amount of time the boss enemy has been viewed as hostile.
total contribution
Total value of each contribution (by class, using total contribution for the overall defense contribution ranking)

{LayoutName}. Are you sure?
The most representative subhuman monster of the Magna continent. <lf>Although they are about the same size as humans, they surpass humans in simple strength and sensory acuity. Although they are often seen, they are dangerous and cannot be defeated by ordinary people, so please contact the Pioneer Bureau first.
The most representative subhuman monster of the Magna continent. <lf>They are more ATK and stronger than ordinary goblins. During battle, they forget about their friends and look only in front of them, so they are sometimes said to have a more boorish personality than the Tyrant Boar.
The most representative subhuman monster of the Magna continent. <lf>With a ferocious and brutal temperament, it loves the blood of living creatures and attacks its prey for the sheer pleasure of killing. Several teams of adventurers have been driven to destruction, and the Pioneer Bureau strongly discourages adventurers from fighting alone.
The most representative subhuman monster of the Magna continent. <lf>Although weak in strength, they are intelligent and cunning. They play the role of a general staff of the herd, inciting other goblins to attack their enemies. Some of them are said to understand human language.
The most representative subhuman monster of the Magna continent. <lf>A special Elder Goblin with a high level of intelligence and many enigmatic behaviors. They have been seen many times performing mysterious rituals with goblins under their control. The details of his intentions are still unknown.
The most representative subhuman monster of the Magna continent. <lf>Goblin warriors wear eccentric masks to show off their power. Some goblin herds have a ritualistic custom of hunting large beasts, and only those who have accomplished this are allowed to wear the mask.
The most representative subhuman monster of the Magna continent. <lf>A kind of goblin who is as stoic as a military man. They are strict with themselves and spare no pains for self-improvement on a daily basis. They are highly respected among the herd because of their ability, which they have cultivated through long training.
The most representative subhuman monster of the Magna continent. <lf>A goblin warrior who appears only during the daytime. They have a rough and violent temperament, but for some reason they have a meticulousness that favors a regular life, and at night they always return to their habitat to sleep.
The most representative subhuman monster of the Magna continent. <lf>The most ferocious goblin warrior, it appears only during the daytime. It is a formidable foe that combines the audacity of repeatedly plundering in broad daylight with the discretion of hiding when it sleeps.
The most representative subhuman monster of the Magna continent. <lf>They are the commanding force of goblins who understand tactics and engage in group battles. Unlike simple rampaging goblins, they fight while protecting themselves and their comrades with shields. They are tough when they block attacks to the rear and maintain the front line.
The most representative subhuman monster of the Magna continent. <lf>Unusually for belligerent goblins, they have learned to defend themselves with shields. It is not a very sturdy shield and will break if it is continually Accepted. When they lose their shields, they turn on each other and charge forward, brandishing their weapons.
The most representative subhuman monster of the Magna continent. <lf>It manipulates engrams to produce effects such as healing wounds and improving physical abilities. It seems to use a unique technique that differs from that of Spell Caster, and research is continuing to elucidate this technique.
The most representative subhuman monster of the Magna continent. <lf>With a wealth of experience, they are highly respected even among goblins. Aside from their strength as individuals, they are also skilled at judging situations, leading their packs, and using skillful tactics to inflict pain on adventurers.
The most representative subhuman monster of the Magna continent. <lf>A special kind of goblin sage, cunning as well as ferocious, and abhorred by other monsters. They may raid and pillage not only human towns and villages, but also goblin settlements of their own kind.
The most representative subhuman monster of the Magna continent. <lf>Among goblins, they are particularly wise and versatile. Most often at the top of their herds, the goblins they lead are highly tactical and pose a great threat.
A subhuman monster that lives mainly near the water and Coast. <lf>They are most concerned with protecting their herds and settlements, and patrol their territory in small groups. They are not very belligerent, but they react violently to those who threaten their livelihood, and are willing to eliminate them by force.
A subhuman monster that lives mainly near the water and Coast. <lf>They are the first of their kind and have won many battles in the past. They have the strength to stand up to even the best goblins and ogres, and have even turned back and dispersed them into scattered pieces.
A subhuman monster that lives mainly near water and the Coast. <lf>They are aged girmies with excellent control over their engrams and have acquired a variety of attack methods. On the other hand, their scales have hardened with age, and they are not very agile, and their swimming seems to have become a bit awkward.
A subhuman monster that lives mainly near water and the Coast. <lf>Elder Guillemie, equipped with higher abilities. It is said that behind this is the result of repeated "experiments" and that they roam around their territory looking for new experimental subjects.
A subhuman monster that lives mainly near water and Coast. <lf>After repeated battles, the structure of their scales has changed. Its hard, sharp scales keep out foreign enemies and symbolize its strong will to protect its flock. He is an honorable warrior who is relied upon and respected by his friends.
A subhuman monster that lives mainly near water or near the Coast. <lf>A special kind of girmi that is entrusted with the front line of battle. Clad in armor given to the heroes of the herd, they face their enemies with valor and daring. The armor should be passed on to the next generation to continue to protect their friends.
A subhuman monster that lives mainly near water and the Coast. <lf>They skillfully manipulate engrams to heal the wounds of their friends. They are valuable as healers for Girmee, which is exposed not only to foreign enemies and territorial disputes, but also to violent ocean currents and rough seas.
A type of "flux" that has become ferocious accept the distortion of avaritia. <lf>They are far more vicious and ferocious than normal goblins. Originally, goblins would flee when they sense danger, but their cowardice has disappeared, and they continue to rampage with their destructive impulses.
A type of "flux" that has become more ferocious accepting the distortion of avaritia. <lf>Its role as a herd raider is unchanged, and it is the first to charge at its prey. They wield their weapons with such ferocious strength that it is quite difficult to catch them in the act.
A type of "Flux" that has become violent and ferocious accepting the distortions of avaritia. <lf>In addition to its high intelligence and cunning, its unstoppable brutality has surfaced. It attacks violently from afar and is dangerous if kept at a distance. It is necessary to deal with them all at once by closing the gap between them.
A type of "Flux" that has gone berserk after Accepting the distortions of Avaritia. <lf>With their enhanced DEF and toughness, they attack monsters at the front of the pack. Accepting no injuries, the Flux fights on until it is defeated, and is a terrifying sight to the eyes of adventurers.
A type of "flux" that has gone berserk due to Accepting the distortion of avaritia. <lf>While going berserk, it has not forgotten its role in supporting its allies. It follows the dangerous Avalitia and Flux in various ways, making it a priority target to be eliminated when encountered.
A type of "flux" that has become violent accepting the distortions of avaritia. <lf>It is said to manipulate distorted engrams and enjoy the sight of its prey flinching in pain. Although the flux is believed to have no clear intentions, there are several accounts of it smiling ominously at wounded adventurers.
A subhuman monster that lives widely alongside goblins. <lf>Their behavior and habits are very similar, but they do not get along well with goblins. They have low intelligence and act on the spur of the moment. When they have the upper hand, they are in high spirits, but when they realize they are at a disadvantage, they flee for their lives.
A subhuman monster widely inhabited along with goblins. <lf>Mooks are a special type of Mook that have strayed from the herd and have changed their constitution as a result of wandering. They have poisonous fluid in their limbs, probably because they have eaten toxic food. Without proper equipment, even adventurers are at risk of coming into contact with them.
A subhuman monster that inhabits widely along with goblins. <lf>Mooks inhabit mainly the canyon areas. They manipulate earth engrams for hunting. They are also seen fighting by taking advantage of their geographical location, and are thought to be more intelligent than normal Mooks.
Along with goblins, subhuman monsters are widely inhabited. <lf>They attack from a distance with bows and stone throwers to ensure their own safety. They are not that wise, as they try to rely on their bows even if they are closed in on at a distance.
A subhuman monster widely inhabited along with goblins. <lf>A subspecies of the Mook Archer that is often seen in canyon areas. They attack while hiding behind rocks and trees. If they do not feel threatened, they will let their guard down and reveal themselves, and when they are struck back, they will repeatedly panic and hide again.
A variant of the Mook Archer, it has been spotted in areas believed to be its territory. It seems to take pleasure in shooting down people on horseback and vehicles, and there have been many reports of its victims. Some adventurers have attempted to lure them out and take them down by taking advantage of their habit.
A subhuman monster widely inhabited along with goblins. <lf>They act as guards for the herds. They are a little smarter than other Mooks and skillfully secure their safety by adjusting the positions of friend and foe even in the midst of battle. They are the first to flee when they see their position is at a disadvantage.
A subhuman monster that lives widely alongside goblins. <lf>They are belligerent, overflowing with self-confidence, and are special Mook scouts. When they spot their prey, they are the first to attack. He may be obsessed with being the first to attack, but he becomes ill-tempered when other Mooks or monsters beat him to the spot.
A subhuman monster widely inhabited along with goblins. <lf>A subspecies of the Mook Scout adapted to the canyon environment. Not only do they serve as guards, but they also manipulate earth engrams to block their prey. They are surprisingly strong and can deliver a painful blow when approached.
Along with goblins, subhuman monsters are widely inhabited. <lf>They boast of being one or two of the most powerful monsters in the herd. They swing down their weapons with such force that they bite into the ground. Although they are large, they are powerful enough to blow away a whole group of people if they are stuck together.
A subhuman monster that lives widely alongside goblins. <lf>Among the Mook Warriors, the Mook Warrior is a special kind of individual that overflows with fighting instincts and finds joy in battles with powerful enemies. They will not retreat a step in any battle, and will continue to wield their weapons until either they or their opponent is defeated.
A subhuman monster that lives widely alongside goblins. <lf>A subspecies of the Mook Warrior that roams the canyon areas. They have excellent fighting skills and are highly ranked among the herd. They act as leaders, leading their subordinate Mooks.
A fusion weapon of machines and monsters restored in the Principality of Bernhardt. <lf>It excels in close combat, taking advantage of its increased power and armor. Due to the weight of its armament, it is not as agile as Mook, but its attacks are more powerful. Also, it has lost none of its timidity that makes it run away from the battlefield.
A fusion weapon of machines and monsters restored in the Principality of Bernhardt. <lf>Developed for rear support, its long-range attacks are much more powerful and accurate than those of the Mook Archer. When in formation, the ATK is capable of shooting down even dragon tribes.
A fusion weapon of machines and monsters restored in the Principality of Bernhardt. <lf>Its emphasis is on combat capabilities utilizing its body movements rather than reconnaissance. It is equipped with DEX to use its armament, has high VIT, and can cope with a variety of terrains. Its greatest advantage is its versatility, which allows it to be used in any field of activity.
A type of "Flux" that has become ferocious after Accepting the distortions of Aberritya. <lf>Its distinctive red eyes peek out from behind its mask, and once it captures prey, it never lets it go. With its strong body, which is said to feel no fatigue, it wields its weapons endlessly and steadily hunts down its prey.

It can skillfully manipulate engrams and can be deployed to the front lines or as rear support in a wide range of fighting styles. One of the masterpieces among the Machina.

A wild animal also known as "horned goat". <lf>A special horned goat with beautiful blue horns. Because they spend the night on the cliffs, they can only be seen during the daytime. Their well-trained legs and backs allow them to lunge and kick with a force that can shatter rocks.
A wild animal also known as a "horned goat. <lf>It is characterized by its large, magnificent horns, which are also its most powerful weapon. It will show no mercy to anyone who steps into its territory, charging head first in a straight line. They are quite strong, and if their horns get caught, they can be easily tossed about.
A wild animal also known as "horned goat". <lf>A special Kaiser elk that wears an engram of fire. It is so fierce and violent in temperament that it is said that its horns burn with fire from the anger it holds inside.
Also known as the "horned goat," this wild animal is a variation of the Kaiser elk, known for its bright fur and graceful horns. <lf>A variant of the Kaiser elk, known for its bright fur and graceful horns. They are majestic and graceful, reminiscent of a beautiful noblewoman. Despite its appearance, however, it is powerful, and anyone who approaches it unintentionally will be in for a rude awakening.
A wild animal also known as a "horned goat". <lf>The Kaiser elk has beautiful shiny horns. Its staple food is mushrooms that grow only during the night, which makes its horns shine. He himself appears only at night, making the beauty of his horns even more fantastic.
A wild animal also known as a "horned goat". <lf>It is a variant of the horned goat, which has horns of a hideous shape. It is said to "bring nightmares," and is feared as a symbol of bad luck because of its ferocious appearance, which reminds one of a monster in the dark night.
A wild animal also known as a "horned goat". <lf>It is not a child of the horngoat, but a different kind of monster. It has a docile temperament, but panics when approached unnecessarily. It prioritizes elimination of the opponent over escape, and becomes extremely aggressive.
A wild animal also known as "horned goat". <lf>A special little goat whose body color is changed by engrams. Although small in stature, they are tireless and have the stamina to run anywhere in the mountains. Once it escapes, it is difficult for even the most experienced hunter to catch up with it.
A type of "flux" that has become ferocious accepting the distortions of avaritia. <lf>They are extremely aggressive, and are especially hostile toward humans. They will attack any human they find en masse, and even if the human escapes, they will vindictively pursue him or her in an attempt to inflict as many wounds as possible.
A small boar, about the size of a person's arm. <lf>It is a different kind of monster from the rumble boar, and it never grows large in this form throughout its life. It does not harm humans and is very popular for its cute appearance. Stuffed toys are also a hot seller.
A small wild boar about the size of a hug. <lf>A rare pink rivulet. It is said that seeing it brings good luck, and at first it was so popular that tours were organized to see it. Although the boars are surprisingly powerful and many people have been injured, there is no end to the number of people who want to see them.
A small wild boar, about the size of a person's arm. <lf>They like to be in the sun and spend their time relaxing in the sun. They are loved by people for their adorable appearance, and tours are organized to see them return to their nests all at once in the evening.
A small boar about the size of a person's arm. <lf>It is a subspecies of the ulibo that has absorbed a special engram from being exposed to ancient relics, resulting in a different appearance from normal. Its appearance is limited, and it is said to bring good luck to those who see it.
A small boar, about the size of a person's arm. <lf>It is an individual that has accumulated more engrams than any other Happihappiuribo, and has further transformed itself. It is a boar that has a lot of engrams and has changed even more. It is a boar that appeals to the public as if it is straddling the great ocean, and some adventurers may or may not have a rivalry with it.
A type of agile predator that runs across grasslands in packs. <lf>They can be seen in the suburbs of Asterleeds and in a wide range of other areas. They often appear in human settlements, destroying fields and causing damage. One alone is not that strong, but if attacked in a group, even adventurers will have a tough time.
A type of agile predator that runs across grasslands in herds. <lf>The land fox is abundant in the highlands. It not only chases its prey, but also skillfully lures them into its herd territory by peeking into their openings. Because of their stealthy footsteps, it is difficult to notice their approach.
A type of agile predator that runs across grasslands in packs. <lf>A special kind of landfox that attacks people with a wild roar. With a ferocious temperament, they form a herd by forcefully subjugating other landfoxes. It is said that it does not fear fire, but instead has the effect of raising its fighting spirit.
A type of agile predator that runs across grasslands in packs. <lf>A special kind of land fox with a jewel-like coat. They have venom in their claws and fangs and can kill even large prey. It is exceptionally intelligent and sometimes plays tricks on humans by trapping them.
A type of agile predator that runs across grasslands in herds. <lf>Accepting the influence of engrams, it is a variant of the Land Fox, which has changed from its physique. It is an extremely powerful monster, and adventurers are urged to stay away from it.
Avaritia appeared in a corner of Montegnor Valley. <lf>It is believed to have crawled out from nearby ruins. It is said that it absorbs engrams as it wanders around in the open, and eventually its distortions will grow until it is beyond control.
A type of agile predator that runs across grasslands in packs. <lf>A variant of the dire howl, it boasts an imposing physique. It is said that it will not let its prey escape even if it has to cross three mountains to get there. Its footprints leave an ominous scent, and some people have been known to fall ill just by approaching it.
An extremely dangerous being that rampages with out-of-the-ordinary power. <lf>Their soul-chilling, horrifying screams will make you prepare for death. Even after the victim has lived for nine lifetimes, its roar is said to reverberate in the mind for an eternity to come.
A type of "flux" that has become ferocious, accepting the distortions of avaritia. <lf>Like the Land Fox, they act in large groups. Although they have lost their leadership as a herd, they attack one after another without pausing for breath, quickly bloodying their prey in the blink of an eye.
A fusion weapon between machines and monsters restored in the Principality of Bernhardt. <lf>It was created based on the Landfox. It is fast and obedient, and is widely used by the Knights of Bernhardt. It is also valued for its ability to return home on its own even if it gets separated from its unit, with little loss of life.
Monsters look like lizards, larger than humans. <lf>They live in a wide range of habitats, including waterside areas, forests, and bushes. They bite their prey with their strong jaws and do not let go until they have eaten. They have a voracious appetite and will feed on anything from livestock and humans to goblins.
A monster that looks like a lizard, larger than a human. <lf>It is a special lizard ghost, strongly Accepted by the engrams of ice. It exhales cold air, which it is not supposed to be good at, and likes to eat prey that has been frozen. It is also seen to be dexterous in crossing to the other side of the river by freezing the surface of the water.
This monster looks like a lizard, larger than a human. <lf>It likes to live in rocky areas, mimicking the surrounding rocks. Its hard scales are so rock-like to the touch that even if you are careful, you may not notice them. In many cases, miners have mistakenly swung their pickaxes at them, angering them.
Monsters look like lizards, larger than humans. <lf>It does not like heat or dryness, and spends most of the day immersed in water. It is said that when it sleeps, it does not move slightly, and Mook sometimes steps on its back and walks across the river.
This monster looks like a lizard, larger than a human. <lf>It has an engram of fire in its body, and its body surface is highly heated. When angered, its body temperature rises and the surrounding water boils, so people in its habitat are advised to stay away from it if they see unnatural steam.
A monster that looks like a lizard, larger than a human. <lf>It is a special lizard ghost that attacks its prey from all sides, whether on land or water. It quickly dives underwater and jumps up to the surface. Whenever it appears, it makes a large wave and bites its prey with the same momentum.
This monster looks like a lizard, larger than a human. <lf>It is a rare species that lives in deserts and is extremely resistant to aridity. It has large jaws to prevent its prey from escaping, and it has both the stamina and the tenacity to pursue its prey as far as it can until it has it down.
A lizard-like monster that is larger than a human. <lf>It is a special lizard ghost with a large amount of poison stored in its body. It roams around its territory in search of prey. Its secretions also contain poison, making it dangerous not only to come in contact with it, but also just to get close to it.
A type of "flux" that has gone berserk due to Accepting the distortion of avaritia. <lf>Active and aggressive, it attacks anyone it sees. Despite appearances, they move quickly and their blows are powerful. If surrounded, they will strike you down unilaterally, with no chance to counterattack.
A type of Bapharia heritage that is still in operation today. <lf>Their main role is reconnaissance and surveillance, and their presence has been confirmed at most Bapharia sites. It is not difficult to destroy them, but there are basically so many of them that it is almost impossible to operate in the ruins without being detected.
A type of Bapharia heritage that is still in operation today. <lf>It fires engram bullets from the center of its eyes and is capable of intercepting them on its own, along with vigilant monitoring. It often appears in conspicuous places such as corridors or in the middle of rooms, perhaps to warn intruders.
A type of Bapharia heritage that is still in operation today. <lf>It is an improved version of the floating orb, capable of firing a series of engram bullets. Although ATK is high, it seems that the surveillance function is reduced when firing, and the sighting may become ambiguous.
A type of Bapharia heritage still in operation today. <lf>A high-firepower type deployed in ruins in high-risk areas. It is equipped with the ability to fire rays of engrams, just like the golem, Quad Arm, and other Bapharia legacies used in combat.
A type of Bapharia heritage that is still in operation today. <lf>An extremely high-performance floating eye specialized for base defense. The ruins where these are deployed are considered important facilities in the Bapharia civilization because they thoroughly eliminate intruders.
A strange crustacean with mushroom-like protrusions on its back. <lf>It is treated as a monster because it reacts aggressively when approached. It is a mystery as to whether it is an animal or a plant, but we do know that it tastes good when eaten.
A mysterious crustacean with mushroom-like protrusions on its back. <lf>A special shrimp mushroom with hallucinogenic venom. The spores they scatter contain poison, which can drift to villages on the wind. As expected, they are inedible to humans, and even goblins shun them.
A mysterious crustacean with mushroom-like protrusions on its back. <lf>The legs of this special shrimp mushroom are developed and hardened to the consistency of iron. The speed at which it swings through the air is blinding, and with a sharp wind noise, it easily crushes rocks and steel.
A strange crustacean with mushroom-like projections on its back. <lf>Its body is poisonous and its coloration is different from normal ones. Care must be taken when killing this creature, as its bodily fluids may enter the mouth. It is said that the poison can be removed with time and effort, and some gourmets like its unique bitterness.
A strange crustacean with mushroom-like projections on its back. <lf>It is a type of shrimp mushroom with a paralyzing poison. Because it is used as a raw material for numbing medicine, hunters and medicine men are often asked to kill it. The Pioneer Bureau is cooperating to try to breed them, but so far, no success has been achieved.
A creature that is neither a bird nor a fish and is said to "swim in the sky". <lf>It especially likes to fly over water. It looks like a fish, but its specific gravity is too light to dive in water. They are smart among wild animals, communicating with their friends through their calls and hunting down prey in groups.

It does not like to be near water, and its main territory is dry areas. It prefers to burn its prey before consuming it, so it will not stop burning until it has killed it.

A creature that is neither a bird nor a fish and is said to "swim in the sky. <lf>This special skyfish is also called the "aristocrat of the sky" because of its graceful appearance as it swims in the sky. Perhaps feeling a sense of superiority by looking down on its opponents, it attacks its prey on the ground with a ferocious attack.
A large creature with a crab-like shell and spider-like multiple legs. <lf>It has a habit of building a territory around its burrow and waiting for its prey. Their hard shells and large bodies are no match for an unarmed person. They are one of the most preferential monsters for adventurers to exterminate, as they are vermin that can attack humans.
A large creature with a crab-like shell and spider-like multiple legs. <lf>It spews flames from its mouth. After death, the fire engram left in its body causes it to emit an appetizing odor that may attract monsters, so the corpse is disposed of immediately.
Large creature with a crab-like shell and spider-like multiple legs. <lf>It wears a cold shell due to ice engrams. Even after it peels off, the shell remains cold, and in summer and hot regions, this shell is worn to cool the body.
A large creature with a crab-like shell and spider-like multiple legs. <lf>Lurking in the dark, they attack their prey while hiding in plain sight. They are extremely difficult to spot, and even adventurers may be caught off guard because of the difficulty of noticing their approach. They are rarely found, and detailed research on their ecology and other aspects of their lives is still in progress.
A large creature with a crab-like shell and spider-like multiple legs. <lf>A special kind of crab spider that has become unusually ferocious. It preys on plants, animals, and monsters at random, ravaging the surrounding environment. It is reported that each time it is discovered, its body is getting bigger.
A large creature with a crab-like shell and spider-like multiple legs. <lf>It has an unusual predatory behavior in which it manipulates soil engrams and vibrates parts of the ground to stun its prey. It can move under soil and sand, and its speed is so amazingly fast that human legs cannot keep up with it.
A large creature with a crab-like shell and spider-like multiple legs. <lf>A ferocious crab spider that rages like a storm. It uses its abnormally developed scissors to unleash a wild attack, mercilessly slicing up anyone who gets caught in its path. The area where it appears is destroyed and turned into a wasteland where not a single blade of grass grows.
Large creatures with crab-like shells and spider-like multiple legs. <lf>It appears only during the daytime. One theory is that this is because they have a low body temperature and cannot move unless they are warmed by the sun's rays. At night, they burrow underground and remain motionless until the next morning.
A large organism with a crab-like shell and spider-like multiple legs. <lf>A type of crab spider that grows much larger than normal. They are very powerful and have a large appetite, sometimes even preying on ogres and Dogormans. Its body never stops growing, and the longer it lives, the larger it becomes.
A large creature with a crab-like shell and spider-like multiple legs. <lf>This is a special kind of wolf spider that excels at stealth. It blends its huge body into the landscape and frequently changes the location of its burrows, making its whereabouts elusive. It also has a strong shell and scissors, making it very difficult to defeat.
Large creatures with crab-like shells and spider-like multiple legs. <lf>It is light intolerant, so it is active only at night. They have eyes, but they can barely see. Instead, it locates its prey with an organ on its forehead and kills it with sharp scissors and horns. Even in the dark, their quick movements are no different.
Large creature with a crab-like shell and spider-like multiple legs. <lf>A special giant crab spider that appears only during the day. A ruthless Hunter, it preys unilaterally on its prey, using its hard shell to defend itself against attacks. A large creature with a crab-like shell and spider-like multiple legs. <lf>A type of crab spider that is smaller than usual. A form of the Queen of Miin transformed to produce offspring. <lf>Strictly speaking, they are not nests, but individually willed life forms. When danger approaches, they protect themselves by producing Miin and gradually increase in number. Therefore, when they are found near human settlements, a request is immediately issued to defeat them.

The form in which the Queen of Miin is transformed to produce her offspring. <lf>She produces blast meens and may even explode on her own at the drop of a hat. Once, a large outbreak occurred in the suburbs of a city, and a large-scale operation was undertaken to evacuate the residents en masse.
The form in which the Queen of Miin is transformed to produce her offspring. <lf>It has a sack-like organ filled with venom that can produce venomine. The ability of an adventurer or hunter is measured by whether or not he or she can exterminate the organ without harming it.
Giant insect monsters that sometimes attack humans. <lf>They can be found anywhere from outdoors to caves and ruins. A giant insect monster that can attack humans. <lf>It is a particularly powerful variant of Miin. It is at the top of the pecking order of Miin's flock and is the center of the pack. It is believed to transform into a nest of Miin over the years, but there have been no sightings yet.
A giant insect monster that can attack humans. <lf>It has the ability to fill a single place with biological engrams and explode. Since it can only do this inside its own body, it is quite powerful, although it blows up into pieces when performed.
A giant insect monster that can attack humans. <lf>Its entire body is filled with venom, which it sprays at foreign enemies. It may also inject itself directly into the enemy's body by piercing the body with a needle. They keep their distance from humans, and although they fight to defend themselves, they do not actively attack. Much of its behavior and ecology is shrouded in mystery.
A strange bird monster that confuses its prey with monstrous sound waves and body patterns. <lf>A special masked moth that wears a cold air under the influence of ice engrams. It may be an important member of the flock, and has been seen to be followed and escorted by other muskmoths.

It weakens its prey by rapidly lowering the ambient temperature. It has a brutal temperament that freezes its companion, the masked moth, as well.
The Avaritia appears in Whispering Cliffs. <lf>The stormy winds that its wings create are like a storm, lightly blowing away its prey and knocking it to the rocks and the ground. Fear-inducing gossip is always circulating, such as having been seen at the center of sandstorms and tornadoes.
Full of curiosity and confidence, they pounce on adventurers as soon as they see them. The flapping of their wings creates a tornado-like gust of wind, and if they are swallowed, they will not survive.
