The mission "The training ground of the god of war" is a very difficult mission to conquer. <lf><lf>This mission requires a party of six players to be assembled in advance. <lf>In addition, the mission also requires the player to make full use of "mission-specific skills". <lf><lf>First, let's practice in the "Tutorial" &gt; <lf>"Action Tutorial" on the mission screen.
The "Claw Fang Shattering Bullet" is a mission-specific skill that can be used to force <lf>an enemy to interrupt its action by hitting against certain attacks. <lf><lf>If it is a close class, it will release a shockwave in front of you, and if it is a <lf>long class, it will fire a high-speed bullet that can reach a certain distance. <lf><lf>Also, interrupting an Enemy's action will increase <lf>"Mission Skill Gauge" by a lot. <lf>Since the gauge of party members can also be increased, <lf>it is important to cooperate to apply skills and keep increasing the gauge.
First, let's practice the "Nail Fang Shattering Bullet". <lf><lf><span color="Action">By pressing [&lt;/&gt; <key color="Action" action="ContentAction1"/><span color="Action">]&lt;/&gt;, <lf>the short range class will release a shockwave in front of you, and <lf>the long range class will launch a high-speed bullet that can reach a certain distance. <lf><lf>Hitting the claw crushing bullets against certain attacks will <lf>force the Enemy to stop its action and increase the <lf>"Mission Skill Gauge" by a large amount. <lf>The gauge is needed to activate the "Guardian Heavenly Shield" which will be practiced next.
The "Guardian Heavenly Shield" is a mission-specific skill that consumes the "Mission Skill Gauge" to activate and <lf>nullifies all attacks. <lf>(You can extend the time of disabling by holding down the activation button.) <lf><lf>It consumes 50% of the gauge to activate the skill once. <lf>The gauge can be increased depending on the action during the battle, <lf>especially if you interrupt the Enemy's action with "Claw Fang Shattering Bullet", <lf>the amount of increase will be more. <lf><lf>While maintaining the gauge amount, activate "Guardian Heavenly Shield" against powerful attacks and <lf>attacks that cannot be avoided.
Next, practice "Guardian Heavenly Shield". <lf><lf><span color="Action">By pressing [&lt;/&gt; <key color="Action" action="ContentAction2"/><span color="Action">]&lt;/&gt;, <lf>the mission skill gauge increased by "Nail Fang Shattering Bullet" earlier will be <lf>consumed for 50% of the gauge, and all attacks of the Enemy will be disabled. <lf>(You can extend the time of disabling by pressing and holding.) <lf><lf>Other gauges are also increased according to your actions during the battle. <lf>While maintaining the gauge amount, activate the "Guardian Heavenly Shield" against powerful attacks and <lf>attacks that cannot be avoided.
aura of a weapon
Bapharia's "Seal of Honor" can be obtained through limited-time events and in exchange for <lf>Exceeding Flam. <lf><lf>Collected Mamoruin can be exchanged for luxurious items at the Souvenir Exchange. <lf><lf>There is no exchange period for both exchange items and Mamoruin, so don't <lf>rush and think carefully before exchanging them.
In this mission, if you pass over the "Poison Puddle", you will get <lf>poison status abnormality and your HP will decrease rapidly. <lf><lf>Equip yourself with Resistance E-imagine or <lf>avoid entering it if at all possible.
If you touch the "exploding spikes", they will explode and <lf>Accept damage. <lf><lf>The exploding spikes will return to normal over time. <lf>They cannot be destroyed by attacks, so <lf>try to stay away from them as much as possible.

class-specific weapon types
A skillful class that excels in party combat, medium- and long-range attacks, and support. <lf>Depending on the battle situation, they can use a variety of skills, such as ranged attacks and recovery, to open up avenues of attack.
This close-range class uses two axes to unleash a fiery onslaught. <lf>By constantly repeating the attack, its power is further increased beyond the limit.
A party-oriented, high-difficulty, long-range class that shows its true value in the presence of its companions. <lf>Keep your distance from the front line and eliminate enemies by firing a barrage of high-powered Element attacks as long as your EP lasts.
A melee class that wields a sword and shield and plays a key role in defense in all phases of battle. <lf>They make full use of their skills to stop enemy invasions and take advantage of party battles.
This is a close- to medium-range class that maintains the front line with a heavy hammer that can be ejected. <lf>Its powerful blow shakes the earth, and protects its comrades from the hordes of enemies.
This close-range class dances on the battlefield with its slender spear and nimble footwork. <lf>It is able to demonstrate its true value by imprinting an "imprint" on the enemy and aiming for a large blow.
A long-range class that plays a variety of music and provides various types of support such as buffing and recovery. <lf>Amplification expands the range of effects and greatly increases the party's strength.
